metadata.title: USN-3726-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: Andreas Hug discovered that Django contained an open redirect in CommonMiddleware. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform phishing attacks.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3726-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.1 python-django-doc - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.1 python-django-common - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.1 python-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
